member.summary: Gets or sets the series to test in the cloud.

member.summary: Gets or sets the locale to test with.

member.summary: Gets or sets the filename to output the NUnit report results.
member.value: The NUnit report results output file.

member.summary: Gets or sets the iOS DSYM File. Optional.

member.summary: Gets or sets the NUnit categories to restrict running to.

member.summary: Gets or sets the NUnit fixture to run.

member.name: P:Cake.Xamarin.TestCloudSettings.TestChunk
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Tests should be run in parallel by Test Method.
member.value: true if Test methods should be run in parallel; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Xamarin.TestCloudSettings.TestFixture
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Tests should be run in parallel by Test Fixture.
member.value: true if Test fixtures should be run in parallel; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Xamarin.TestCloudSettings.AppName
member.summary: Gets or sets the Optional App name to display in Test Cloud.
member.value: The optional name of the app to display in Test Cloud.

member.summary: Gets or sets the keystore file to explicitly use in test-cloud.

member.summary: Gets or sets the keystore alias.

member.name: T:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases
member.summary: Xamarin related cake aliases.

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.AndroidPackage(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.Boolean,System.Action{Cake.Common.Tools.DotNetBuildSettings})
member.summary: Creates an android .APK package file
member.returns: The file path of the .APK which was created (all subfolders of the project file specified are searched for .apk files and the newest one found is returned).
member.param: Will create a signed .APK file if set to true based on the signing settings in the .CSPROJ, otherwise the .APK will be unsigned.

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.MDToolArchive(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.String,System.Action{Cake.Xamarin.MDToolSettings})
member.summary: Creates an archive of an app with MDTool
member.param: The name of the project within the solution to archive.

member.summary: Builds a project with MDTool

member.summary: Restores Xamarin Components for a given project

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.PackageComponent(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.DirectoryPath,Cake.Xamarin.XamarinComponentSettings)
member.summary: Packages the component for a given component YAML configuration file
member.param: The directory containing the component.yaml file.

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.UploadComponents(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Xamarin.XamarinComponentUploadSettings,System.String[])
member.summary: Finds and Uploads .xam component packages which match the globbing patterns
member.param: The globbing patterns to find .xam component package files with.

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.UploadComponent(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.Xamarin.XamarinComponentUploadSettings)
member.summary: Uploads a .xam component package which is a new version of an existing component in the store

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.SubmitComponents(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Xamarin.XamarinComponentSubmitSettings,System.String[])
member.summary: Finds and Submits .xam component packages which match the globbing patterns
member.param: The globbing patterns to find .xam component package files with.

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.SubmitComponent(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.Xamarin.XamarinComponentSubmitSettings)
member.summary: Submits a .xam component package which is a brand new component on the store and has no previous versions

member.summary: Runs UITests in a given assembly using NUnit

member.summary: Uploads an android .APK package to TestCloud and runs UITests
member.param: The hash of the set of devices to run on.
The directory containing the UITests assemblies.

member.name: T:Cake.Xamarin.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: This namespace contain types representing data used for interaction with the Xamarin platform.
